abstract: Rabbi Eugene B Borowitz, leading theologian of Reform Judaism whose philosophical works argued for balance between reason and covenantal relationship with God, dies at age 91.

headline.print_headline: Rabbi Eugene B. Borowitz, Influential Reform Theologian, Dies at 91
headline.main: Rabbi Eugene B. Borowitz, Influential Reform Theologian, Dies at 91

snippet: Rabbi Borowitz argued that a balance must be struck between the modern desire for independently shaping a person’s religious ideas and a more traditional vision of a commanding God.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Borowitz argued that a balance must be struck between the modern desire for independently shaping a person’s religious ideas and a more traditional vision of a commanding God.
